name: ReferralForAdultDepression
title: Referral for Adult Depression
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent appropriate referrals specific to the adult age group for depression management.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Intervention.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with appropriate referrals as specific to the adult age group for depression management.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
